content.question: In designing the Basilica Ulpia for the Forum of Trajan, Apollodorus of Damascus drew upon ancient Egyptian traditions of the clerestory most likely because a clerestory provided

choices.label: an efficient way to illuminate the interior
an open space that could accommodate large crowds
tiered seating for spectators and scribes
niches for the display of statues of the emperor

content.answer: an efficient way to illuminate the interior
